message.body: Just landed in philly. Hope the screening is going well
Lindsey, great. Glad to hear that. The screening is in 2 hours. I'll let you know how it goes. Xo.
Okay good luck!! Have fun!
Thanks so much Lindsey. I really really wish you could be here for it.
Totally.
Me too:( I'm like an absentee father!
Haha.
I'll do my best to represent your film well. To that end, what camera did we shoot on again? I just want to make sure I remember correctly in case anyone asks. Can't wait for you to get here.
We shot on the arri! Used 500d kodak film. Animation was and drawn and superimposed using photoshop, totally archaic
Awesome. Thanks!
￼￼Good crowd.
Holy shit
I just got nervous.
Hah!
I think we will have sell outs at both screenings.
Omg! Really! This is so exciting.
I'm so glad you are there.
Me too. Thank you so much for inviting me.
Of course!!! Let's drink beer as soon as I get there.
Cool. Keep me posted on where you are.
Will do. Anthony (the driver) is sending someone to pick me up at 9:30. Taking me to the cabin.
Oh no! I wonder what happened! Such a bummer. Maybe better I wasn't there I'd be so mad!

Also, the programmer told me right before the screening that he didn't want to do a Q&A with me after, that we should wait for you to arrive and do it on Monday, which is fine. You are who people want to talk to.
I did get some positive responses about love letter after.
I know; I thought the same thing.
The Sublime and Beautiful is amazing.
Yeah.
Tom told me the main screen is a pop up Style Screen
Which made me laugh a little
It's not so impressive.
I can't believe it was in black and white. Do you know if they got the hdcam? I emailed them to let me know if they did and no One responded
I know. Yes, they have the tape, and I gave them the blu ray backup when I got here.
They had no explanation for what happened.
I told them we better get it right on Monday.
Yeah threaten them with your muscles!
Oh well. I'm going to be really zen about it
It's the only way to be.
Okay well I'm gearing up for flight #3 today. See you soon!
Alright! I hope it is fast and easy .
Are you in Phoenix yet?
Just landed in salt lake. Got a direct flight!
Awesome!
I'm at the condo with beer.
There is no food here, so you may want to grab something from the airport.
Or we can walk down and get you something from 7-11, or order a pizza (if that is an option where we are).
Do you need anything from the airport? I'll grab a samdwich
Sure. I'd eat a Sando if something looks good; veggie or turkey or whatevs.
If not, no worries. I can eat beer.
Welcome to Utah! I will see you soon!
Everything is closed here. Might need some 7-11 nachos. I am also okay to eat beer. See you soon!
All good! We'll find something,
Call me when you get to the entrance to the Canyons resort and I will come out and help you with your stuff.
Okay. Will do. I only have a backpack
The buildings are lettered but it's difficult to see at night. We are in I.
Should be easy.
Cool. I just want to show you where to go.
Definitely.
Correct.
You will turn into the resort, pass the 7-11, go up a hill and take a left. Go up to the top of that hill and enter the parking lot for H, I, J, K.
Great. Perfect.
If you have any trouble finding it, just call me.
Cool.
Y driver wasn't expecting me this early she will be here in 5
When she takes me deep into the woods I will definitely call you ha
How far is the drive?
It's about 45 minutes.
Little bit.
Not too bad, though.
After 2 days of flying, what's 45 minutes. Geez.
It's a hike
God I know. I feel like a crazy person.
I'll make things as easy on you as possible.
I know my way around at this point.
Gonna conserve battery, down to 20 %. Will all you at the entrance in a bit!
Okay. Sounds good.
See ya!
Coming out.
Almost here! Just entered the canyon
